JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Warehouse- and packaging employees in Aalborg
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
For our customers in Aalborg, MatchMind is looking for temporary employees for packaging and warehouse tasks.

You can expect to be offered 1-4 shifts every week at different companies in your area. 

The work will be scheduled during daytime, Monday to Friday. You will have acces to an online calendar, so we know which days you are available to work.   

We expect that you:

  • Thrive in a high paced environment
  • Are stable and eager to learn
  • Can work within short notice

If you have any questions, Anja Winther is available on: awi@matchmind.dk or on phone 70 70 23 33.
